A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: To me\, the movie was just fine. I found myself frequently asking myself “When are all the characters going to actually meet up?”. Not to mention the fact that the character of Supreme Leader Snoke was completely wasted. And this might be just a personal preference thing but what was the sparkly gold robe he was wearing? He’s supposed to look menacing not like the space version of Gianni Versace! Also\, the whole three different subplots with Rey\, Finn\, and Poe just didn’t make sense to me.
